entry.title: Taste of Nature Cookies 'N Cream Bites Theater Box 3.1oz - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Taste of Nature
Type: Candy
Price: 19.25

Taste of Nature Cookies 'N Cream Bites Theater Box 

Calling all Cookies 'N Cream lovers we've got the snack for you! Enjoy a smooth, creamy cookie dough with added cookie pieces for an extra. crunch. Take these sweet treats anywhere with you, in this convenient theatre box.

  • Egg free
  • Made in the USA
  • Kosher Certified

3.1oz x 12 boxes

Ingredients

White confectionery coating ( sugar, palm kernel oil, whole milk powder, reduced mineral whey powder, nonfat milk powder, soy lecithin (an emulsifier), salt, and vanilla), Cookies and cream cookie dough (wheat flour, sugar, partially hydrogenated vegetable oil, (palm kernel, soybean, cottonseed), glycerin, powdered sugar (sugar, cornstarch), high fructose corn syrup, natural and artificial flavors, salt sodium bicarbonate), and chocolate flavored bits (sugar, corn syrup, wheat flour, modified corn starch, cocoa (processed with alkali), soybean oil, natural and artificial flavor).. Note: This product is packaged in a facility which also packages peanuts, other nuts, milk solids, eggs, wheat, and soy protein.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by manufacturer and considered accurate at time of posting. Refer to product labeling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.

entry.title: M&M's Peanut Chocolate Candies Theater Boxes - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars
Type: Chocolate
Price: 22.00

M&M's Candies with Peanuts

"It melts in your mouth and not in your hand."

Some days the need for a peanutty crunch seems to overtake you, we say let it win with the M&M's Peanut Chocolate Candies! This candy will "melt in your mouth and not in your hand" just one of the many reasons to love M&M's Candy! Each colourful candy is filled with the most delectable crunch of roasted peanuts and covered in a layer of real milk chocolate. Coated to colourful perfection with its sweet candy shell!

Yes, there's a reason it's been a favourite classic candy since 1941! This old fashioned candy has melted in the hungry, candy craving mouths of many! Let it melt in yours with the M&M's Peanut Chocolate Candies!

Good & Plenty Licorice Candy Theater Box will definitely give you "plenty" of that black licorice candy flavour you love! entry.title: Boston Baked Beans Candy Theater Box - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Company
Type: Candy
Price: 22.00

Boston Baked Beans Candy Coated Peanuts

Boston Baked Beans Candy Theater Box is an old fashioned candy we love. Introduced in the early 1930s, and made by the Ferrara Pan Candy Company, the makers of another famous candy-like "Atomic Fireballs".  Boston Baked Beans Candy are a delicious candied peanut, not really a bean! The peanuts are coated using the panning process. Layers and layers of a delicious red candy coating all wrapped around a peanut. A yummy snack anytime, but is especially great for a movie time candy treat. Surprise your customers with this old fashioned candy! 

Theater Pack

4.3 oz. Pack | 12 COUNT BOX

Fresh Retro Candy Shipped Fast at Wholesale Prices!
